channel.title: Late Fame on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Late Fame on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Late Fame’ Review: Willem Dafoe Is a Lost Poet Who Gets Rediscovered in Kent Jones’s Enchanting Drama of Bohemia Then and Now
item.description: Ed, in “Late Fame,” goes on a journey — into his past, but really into the question of whether who he was and what he was can still exist in the present.
